net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.filter
Interface TextFilter

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractTextFilter, IdentityTextFilter, LiteralTextFilter, ParamTextFilter, PreformattedTextFilter, RegexParamTextFilter, RegexTextFilter
public interface TextFilter

Interface for text filters that can work on any taglets.

Version:
1.5 (2008/03/30 12:43:18)
Maintainer:
Bruno Essmann <essmann@sourceforge.net>
Since:
1.6.0

          Configures this filter according to the configuration object passed in.

          Returns the name of this filter.

isInitialized

boolean isInitialized()
Check if the filter has been properly initialized.

Returns:
true if the filter has been initialized and is ready for filtering, false otherwise.
Since:
1.6.0

configure

void configure(Logger logger,
               Configuration configuration)
Configures this filter according to the configuration object passed in.

Parameters:
logger - the logger to use for message output during configuration.
configuration - the configuration to use.

filter

String filter(Logger logger,
              String text)
Filters the specified input text.

Parameters:
logger - logger to use for message reporting.
text - the text to filter.
Returns:
the filtered output text.

1.6.0
